short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: News about gaming from around the web. A gamer's must!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gaming News Feed is a Chrome extension that provides a quick and immersive gaming search experience directly from your new tab. Stay updated with the latest gaming news, reviews, and trends from around the web- all in one place. Simply open a new tab to start browsing your personalized gaming feed instantly.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome', you accept and agree to install the ‘Gaming News Feed’ Chrome™ extension.Gaming News Feed provides new tab search results powered by Yahoo!.

Privacy: https://www.bethegamepro.com/privacy
TOU: https://www.bethegamepro.com/tos
